name: Toungy
description: This is a speedrunning game. Use Toungy's Toung to get to the top of the tower inside of the square.  Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Use Space Bar to jump. Use E to use Toung to grapple up walls or grab people. The Toung will shoot out if you have the mouse over a wall, person, or block. and press E. A timer is in the top left. make a video or post your time in the comments. I have a time of 10:14. I don't think anyone will beat it. Thank You Have Fun!
